name: Glub! Glug! Grapple!
description:
CONTROLS: 

- SPACE: jump   |   LMB: grapple   |   A/D/Left/Right: swing (move while grappling)

Rush the fish into its water bowl! It has fallen out and needs help.

Made in 13 days for the LowRezJam. I made 10 levels, each with different difficulty.

Music and SFX by Blue.Nocturne
